entry.title: Monday: A few showers. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
